title: Textbook publishing revenue in the U.S. 2010 to 2018
summary: Overall Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015, and lastly roughly constant from 2015 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, about 11.7 was reported at Year 2015
Minimum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 8.16 was reached at Year 2012
